```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
library(readr)

normalize <- function(x) {
    return ((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x)))
}
```

# Load and process indivdual ranks

```{r, message=FALSE}
name <- "../data/exp44_d-0.2e-3_f12_r300.csv"
results <- read_csv(paste(name, sep=""))
print(range(results$rank))
results %>%
  filter(n_spikes > 0, rank==299) -> results
```


```{r, fig.width=2.5, fig.height=1.5}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=variances)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) + 
  xlab("Variance") +
  theme_classic() -> p1

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=errors)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) + 
  xlab("Error") +
  theme_classic() -> p2

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  xlab("Vc (volt)") +
  theme_classic() -> p3

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_comp)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  xlab("Vo (volt)") +
  theme_classic() -> p4

grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow=2)
```

  geom_point() +
